violations.description: Ensure every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
violations.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute

violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.75 (foreground color: #909090, background color: #eeeeee, font size: 8.7pt (11.6px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

violations.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

nodes.html:
<div class="uk-position-relative uk-visible-toggle uk-light uk-slider uk-slider-container" tabindex="-1" aria-label="Carousel slider" uk-slider="
        autoplay: 0;
        autoplay-interval: 7000;
        finite:  0 ;
        velocity: 1;
      " role="region" aria-roledescription="carousel" data-once="ck-uikit-carousel-accessibility">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

violations.description: Elements marked as presentational should not have global ARIA or tabindex to ensure all screen readers ignore them
violations.help: Ensure elements marked as presentational are consistently ignored

nodes.html: <ul class="uk-slider-items uk-grid uk-grid-collapse" uk-height-match="target: .slide-text" aria-live="polite" role="presentation" id="uk-slider-1" style="transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px);">
nodes.failureSummary:
